data.name: Super Red-Hot Hero
data.detailed_description:
Super Red-Hot Hero is a frenzied, action-platformer inspired by Super Mario Bros., Super Meat Boy, Sonic the Hedgehog, and Mega Man. Teleport through Red-Hot Energy faster than the speed of light, punching and shooting the soldiers of the Kazan Army in your path. Make your enemies explode in order to create a fiery path to save your volcanic island from the villainous king!

Escaped super soldier project, Super Red-Hot Hero, is being chased by the TV robot minions of the Kazan Army. The villainous King Kazan and his top scientist Dr. Professor will stop at nothing to capture their prized test subject.

Super Red-Hot Hero comes with over 30 fast-paced levels loaded with creative enemies, brain-teasing puzzles, collectibles, and time trial modes for skilled, speedrunnnig players.

data.short_description: Super Red-Hot Hero is a frenzied action-platformer, indie game inspired by Super Mario Bros., Super Meat Boy and Mega Man. Teleport through Red-Hot Energy at the speed of light, punching and shooting the TV robot forces of the Kazan Army in your path to save your island!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gforce GT740
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOs Snow Leopard
  • Processor: i3 7100
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gforce GT740
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
